document.full_text: france and germany took in the most asylum seekers among european union member states during 2010, but the overall total declined slightly from the year before, the eu statistics agency said tuesday.
document.title: france, germany accept most asylum applicants to eu
lines_and_colors: france and germany took in the most asylum seekers among european union member states during 2010, but the overall total declined slightly from the year before, the eu statistics agency said tuesday.
